config.Furniture Catalogue.name: Furniture Catalogue
config.Furniture Catalogue.description: DEFAULT option adds all missing items from 1.5, including festival shop inventory, museum rewards, movie theater prizes, and rare/secret items. It also adds a small number of new 1.6 items that are available at regular shops. EXTENDED option adds all furniture & decor items that are missing from the new themed catalogues. COMPLETE option adds all furniture & decor items in the game, including those found in the new themed catalogues. Do not choose EXTENDED or COMPLETE if you're trying to avoid 1.6 spoilers!
config.Resize Furniture Catalogue.name: Resize Furniture Catalogue
config.Resize Furniture Catalogue.descri: Changes the Furniture Catalogue to a 1-tile footprint like the other catalogues.
config.Recolor.name: Recolor
config.Recolor.description: (For the Resize Furniture Catalogue option) Choose Earthy if using DaisyNiko's Earthy Interiors. Choose VPR if using Vibrant Pastoral Recolor. For other furniture/interior recolors, choose whichever option looks best. (Vanilla is the default oak color, VPR is a medium brown, and Earthy is a darker brown.)
config.Wallpaper & Floor Catalogue.name: Wallpaper & Floor Catalogue
config.Wallpaper & Floor Catalogue.descr: Adds the new 1.6 wallpapers & floors to the Catalogue sold at Pierre's shop.
